Song.title: You Gave Your Son
Song.copyright: Words and music by Mark Altrogge © 2009 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G | G | D/G | D/G | Em/G | Em/G | D/G | D/G]
Verse 1: [G]Father, compassionate and [D/G]tender Your ears are ever [Em/G]open to my pr[D/G]ayers [G]Father, You feed the crying [D/G]ravens You daily lift the [Em/G]burdens that I b[D/G]ear So [C]I will thank You [Em]for Your [D]mercy
Chorus: [G]You gave Your [Am]Son Righteous [Em]One for [D]the def[C]iled [G]You gave Your [Am]Son By His [Em]blood we’re [D]recon[C]ciled To our [G | G | Am | Am | Em | D | C]God
Verse 2: [G]Father, You know that I grow [D]weary I need You to draw [Em]near me{,} and be my [D]strength [G]Father, I long to know Your p[D]resence For You’re the joy of [Em]heaven{,} and my [D]King So [C]I will thank You [Em]for Your [D]mercy
Bridge: [Em]Whom have [C]I in [D]heaven but You And [C6]none on [Em]earth com[Dsus]pares with [D]You [(repeat)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 father compassionate and tender your ears are ever open to my prayers father you feed the crying ravens you daily lift the burdens that i bear so i will thank you for your mercy chorus you gave your son righteous one for the defiled you gave your son by his blood were reconciled to our god verse 2 father you know that i grow weary i need you to draw near me and be my strength father i long to know your presence for youre the joy of heaven and my king so i will thank you for your mercy bridge whom have i in heaven but you and none on earth compares with you
